definition: to climb (by pulling oneself up)/to implicate/to claim connections of higher status

sentences.english: And I'm not climbing at Longdong, either.
sentences.chinese: 而且我也不要去龙洞攀岩。

sentences.english: Bouldering is a type of free climbing without any ropes.
sentences.chinese: 抱石是一种没有任何绳索保护的攀岩运动。
hazard攀岩者有时冒着生命危险。

sentences.english: Why are you so passionate about rock climbing even though it's dangerous?
sentences.chinese: 为什么攀岩那么危险你还喜欢呢？

sentences.english: Climbers on the artificial climbing wall on the Diga diLuzzone dam in Tessin, Switzerland
sentences.chinese: 登山者在瑞士提契诺州的人工攀岩墙上。

sentences.english: Rock climbers descend the spire of Tricouni Nail in the Needles of South Dakota Black Hills.
sentences.chinese: 南达科他州黑岗石林里，攀岩者从三齿钉山尖下滑。

sentences.english: Nail in the Needles of South Dakota Black Hills.
sentences.chinese: 南达科他州黑岗石林里，攀岩者从三齿钉山尖下滑。

sentences.english: Knot tying is vital in rock climbing.
sentences.chinese: 打结在攀岩运动中是至关重要的。

sentences.english: Rock climbers and sports car drivers must be fatalist.
sentences.chinese: 攀岩运动汽车司机必须是宿命论者。

sentences.english: In addition to climbing, the area is popular with hillwalkers and those interested in natural history.
sentences.chinese: 除攀岩外，这里也深受走山族和自然史爱好者的喜爱。

sentences.english: so I can start getting paid to take people climbing.
sentences.chinese: 所以我可以带人攀岩挣钱了。

sentences.english: Due to the technicity of this kind of climbing it is mostly reserved for advanced climbers.
sentences.chinese: 由于技术原因，这多数是对于高级攀岩者而言。

sentences.english: The invention could be used in things like climbing ropes, or bridge supports.
sentences.chinese: 此项发明可用于攀岩绳或是桥梁支架之类物品。

sentences.english: How did you start doing rock climbing?
For the beginner, any clothing tough enough to take abrasion will suffice.
sentences.chinese: 对于初级攀岩者来说，任何耐磨的衣服都可以。

sentences.english: In his spare time he enjoys technical rock and ice climbing in equally far-flung places.
sentences.chinese: 闲暇时，他喜欢到一样偏远的地方攀岩和攀冰。

definition: to climb/to pull oneself up/to clamber/to scale/fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger
